table.name: vtiger_office
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_office` ( `officeid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `office` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `presence` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `picklist_valueid` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `sortorderid` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `city` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`officeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_officecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_officecf` ( `vtiger_officecf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_officecf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
